title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 150.2 - Measurements of distance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 150.2 - Measurements of distance

State Regulations

Distance from the edge of a right-of-way shall be measured
horizontally along a line normal or perpendicular to the centerline of the
highway. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
150.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
